United States Court of Appeals
                  For the First Circuit
                        ____________________

Nos. 01-1693, 01-1694


MINERVA QUINTANA-RUIZ, ON HER OWN BEHALF AND IN REPRESENTATION OF
           HER MINOR DAUGHTER, INES M. REYES-QUINTANA,
               Plaintiff, Appellee, Cross-Appellant,

                                 v.

                   HYUNDAI MOTOR CORPORATION,
              Defendant, Appellant, Cross-Appellee.

                        ____________________

                            ERRATA SHEET

          The opinion of this court, issued August 27, 2002, should
be amended as follows:

Page 23, line 15: replace "design" with "performance"
